column4: hi, is here somebody skilled with pure-ftpd and the UMASK directive? i simply can't understand it. i always try to compare it to the CHMOD directive, but it doesn't pass, it ain't similar. and i dunno what number what means. can somebody explain me? thx.

hi, is here somebody skilled with pure-ftpd and the UMASK directive? i simply can't understand it. i always try to compare it to the CHMOD directive, but it doesn't pass, it ain't similar. and i dunno what number what means. can somebody explain me? thx.
the umask is the binary complement of the chmod. For chmod 755 you would use umask 022
